CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): NA
E2B (R3): E.i.1.1b Reaction / Event as Reported by the Primary Source Language Conformance: Optional, but required if E.i.1.1a is populated. Data Type: 3A OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.100 Value Allowed: ISO 639-2/RA, alpha-3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide the language used to describe the reaction/event
CustomField.label: Reaction/Event as Source Langauge
